content:
Hims & Hers Health, Inc. (better known as Hims & Hers) is the leading health and wellness platform, on a mission to help the world feel great through the power of better health. We are revolutionizing telehealth for providers and their patients alike. Making personalized solutions accessible is of paramount importance to Hims & Hers and we are focused on continued innovation in this space. Hims & Hers offers nonprescription products and access to highly personalized prescription solutions for a variety of conditions related to mental health, sexual health, hair care, skincare, heart health, and more.
Hims & Hers is a public company, traded on the NYSE under the ticker symbol “HIMS”. To learn more about the brand and offerings, you can visit hims.com and forhers.com, or visit our investor site. For information on the company’s outstanding benefits, culture, and its talent-first flexible/remote work approach, see below and visit www.hims.com/careers-professionals.
About the Role:

Hims and Hers is seeking an experienced Frontend Architect to help build a fast, reliable, and frictionless telemedicine end-user experience.
You Will:

Lead the vision for the team and the platform as technical leader, identifying new and strategic technologies that improve security, scalability, reliability, and performance.
Develop and sustain comprehensive architectural diagrams, elucidating the structural, interactive, and dependency aspects of the system
Take part in all frontend engineering-related and business-related decisions, with the expectation that you’ll drive technical strategy and leadership to development teams
Independently build cross-team relationships to collaborate and lead the way in developing reusable, scalable designs that benefit the entire organization, and align these technical initiatives with business goals
Collaborate with backend architects to integrate these scalable solutions, ensuring optimal performance and user experience
You will set best practices for architecture, coding, delivery, and operation of your team's services
Design the architecture of React-based applications and create high-level designs that outline how different components, modules, and data flow will interact to meet the project's goals and requirements
Brainstorm features with product and designers, and guide decisions based on your knowledge of the codebase
Actively participate in retrospectives and help drive continuous improvement in our process and culture

You Have:

12+ years as a software engineer, shipping production code. Experience in management is a plus
Proven experience in developing large-scale e-commerce or similar complex platforms.
Experience with modern web technologies like React, GraphQL, Javascript, Typescript, HTML5, CSS3, experience with mobile frameworks (React Native), patterns and practices a plus
Expertise in scalable frontend architectures like micro frontends and domain-driven design for web and mobile applications
Strong understanding of CSS, design principles, and component library creation
Expertise in SEO, web performance and organic traffic optimization
Exceptional problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Excellent communication skills and the ability to translate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
Strong understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.
Ability to move quickly and meet tight deadlines
Capable of prioritizing multiple projects in order to meet goals without management oversight

 
Our Benefits (there are more but here are some highlights):

Competitive salary & equity compensation for full-time roles
Unlimited PTO, company holidays, and quarterly mental health days
Comprehensive health benefits including medical, dental & vision, and parental leave
Employee Stock Purchase Program (ESPP)
Employee discounts on hims & hers & Apostrophe online products
401k benefits with employer matching contribution
Offsite team retreats

At Hims & Hers, we seek to establish an inclusive environment and are committed to building a team that reflects the unique perspectives, life experiences and varying backgrounds of the diverse populations that make up our customer base. To help us ensure we are meeting our equal employment obligations under U.S. employment law and identify areas of improvement in our process, we invite all U.S.-based candidates to complete the following demographic questions (if you are based outside of the United States, please select “I don't wish to answer”). 

 

Your responses will be anonymized and reviewed in aggregate only and will not in any way be associated with your application or used in the hiring process.  We hope that you will voluntarily complete this form and support us in our inclusion efforts.

What strategies or tools did you employ to address the issue and measure improvements?"
